name: ALL PLANNED
description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, we have a problem

Oh No ! The engines are malfunctioning !

Everyone go on the wings to help stabilize the plane !

Move LEFT and RIGHT to stabilize the wings. If one of the engine breaks down, rush to the other side of the plane to maintain balance !

Try to reach the landing ahead !

Controls

LEFT / RIGHT or A / D to move the passengers on the wings.

Credits

Hobzone
Sirkovitch
with music by Mathieu Dubois
